item.title: Getting People to Use Software is Hard
item.description: You're sure you've created a stellar solution to a problem at hand. You took the time to think an idea out and execute. You iterated tirelessly, making tweaks and creating a tool that will sell itself to potential human users. Everyone loves their own creation. Others will realize the tool's â€¦
